parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (int64) Unique ID for a service principal in the Databricks workspace.

200.description: Service principal information was returned successfully.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Gets the details for a single service principal define in the Databricks workspace.
